"Overcoming the Healing Obstacles": "Overcome the obstacles to restoring your HP!"
"Overcome the obstacles to restoring your HP!"
"HP回復効果の妨害を乗り越えろ！"
"HP回復効果の妨害を乗り越えろ！"

"/face2 Huh? That's odd! I thought some stop switches

"/face2 There's a total of $(0) switches around
